title: Build Quick Resto restaurant finder app

requirements.text: Create a restaurant data model in the backend that stores restaurant name, cuisine type, price range (budget/moderate/expensive), rating (1-5 stars), address, hours of operation, and menu highlights as an array of strings
acceptanceCriteria: Restaurant model includes all specified fields
Backend exposes methods to create and retrieve restaurants
Price range is stored as a categorical value

requirements.text: Implement backend methods to add restaurants, get all restaurants, and filter restaurants by cuisine type, price range, and minimum rating
acceptanceCriteria: Can add new restaurants to the system
Can retrieve all restaurants
Can filter by cuisine type
Can filter by price range
Can filter by minimum rating threshold

requirements.text: Create a main restaurant listing page that displays all restaurants in a grid layout with restaurant photos, name, cuisine type, rating display, and price range indicator
acceptanceCriteria: Restaurants display in a responsive grid
Each card shows photo, name, cuisine, rating, and price
Layout works on mobile and desktop

requirements.text: Implement search functionality that allows users to search restaurants by name in real-time
acceptanceCriteria: Search bar filters restaurants as user types
Search is case-insensitive
Results update without page reload

requirements.text: Add filter controls for cuisine type, price range, and minimum rating that work together to refine the restaurant list
acceptanceCriteria: Users can select cuisine type from dropdown
Users can select price range filter
Users can set minimum rating filter
Multiple filters work together simultaneously
Clear filters option available

requirements.text: Create a restaurant detail view that displays full information including address, hours of operation, menu highlights, rating, price range, and cuisine type when a user clicks on a restaurant card
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a restaurant opens detail view
All restaurant information is displayed
Menu highlights are shown as a list
Hours of operation are clearly formatted
User can return to main listing

requirements.text: Design a modern, food-focused visual theme with warm, appetizing colors (earth tones, oranges, greens), clean typography, and an inviting layout that emphasizes restaurant imagery and creates a welcoming browsing experience
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses warm, food-appropriate colors
Typography is clean and readable
Layout emphasizes visual content
Design feels modern and inviting

requirements.text: Render generated restaurant images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated for use in restaurant listings
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored in correct directory
Images are referenced correctly in restaurant cards
Images load properly in the UI

constraints: Use single-actor Motoko architecture for backend
Frontend must use React, Tailwind CSS, and React Query
Do not modify immutable frontend paths
nonGoals: Map integration or GPS location services
